remarks: Two numbers are the canonical representation of a rational iff they are coprime and have the right quotient.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 13-Sep-2014.)
statement: qnumdenbi $p |- ( ( A e. QQ /\ B e. ZZ /\ C e. NN ) -> ( ( ( B gcd C ) = 1 /\ A = ( B / C ) ) <-> ( ( numer ` A ) = B /\ ( denom ` A ) = C ) ) ) $.
